GMCI is aware of how essential it is for you to preserve your privacy anytime you access one of the company’s websites. We take the safety of your personal data very seriously. Therefore, we would like to inform you about what data we hold, what we do, and how we use this data. With this in mind, we would like to use this Privacy Statement to make you aware of our data security policies.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”19px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_5_font=”Lato|900|||||||” header_5_text_color=”#000000″ header_5_font_size=”30px” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

1. Data Processing

 You can still use our online presentation without sharing your personal details. Whenever our database is loaded, the following data is saved for backup and optimisation purposes:

IP address:
Date and date of submission
Time zone disparity in Greenwich Mean Time (GMT)
Contents of the request (specific page)
Link access code / HTTP access
The sum of data transmitted by request
Website from which the submission originated
Browser is open
Operating device and configuration
Language and version of the client app

While this data may theoretically require recognition, it is not used to recognize individuals. While it can be used for statistical purposes, person users stay confidential. Where data is distributed to external service providers, we ensure that data security laws are complied with by means of reasonable arrangements with these external service providers and by means of technological and organizational steps.

2. Collecting and processing of relevant data

Personal details can only be obtained if you knowingly supply us with such detail, such as whether you apply with something, fill up documents, submit e-mails, order commodities / services, make requests or request content.

We will only use the personal data obtained from you to provide you with the goods or services you have ordered, or for some other reason for which you have given your permission, unless expressly permitted by regulation. There, too, in so far as data is passed on to other service providers, we have assured, by statutory standards as well as technological and operational steps, that data security laws are complied with.

a) Contact Form

GMCI gives you the chance to email us directly using the contact form given. For this reason, you may provide the following information:

Title
First and last name(s)
E-mail
Company
Website
Phone number
Street address
Country, state, zip code, town/city
Message

b) Inquiry via e-mail, telephone or fax

If you contact us via e-mail, phone or fax, your request, and all personal details (name, address) will be registered and processed by us for the purpose of processing your query. We do not share this data without your permission.

The data you give us via contact request must stay with us until you request withdrawal, withdraw your consent to storage, or the object of data collection will no longer exist (e.g. after your request has been processed). Mandatory regulatory requirements, in specific legislative maintenance terms, remain unchanged.

3. What are the rights to personal data protection?

GMCI would like to make sure that you are completely informed of all your rights to the security of personal details. Each consumer shall have the right to the following:

The right of access
The right of rectification or erasure
The right of restriction of processing
The right to object to processing
The right of data portability

If you would like to exercise some of these rights, please contact us (see the section “How to reach us” below). In that case, GMCI has one (1) month to respond to you.

4. Changes to privacy policy

GMCI retains the opportunity to amend its privacy policies, in particular as a consequence of improvements to the legal system. We suggest that you update this guide on a daily basis, which is posted on our website, so that you can easily be aware about any improvements in the way we handle your Personal Details.

 

5. Contact Us
